title: I feel like one of Vladimir's weaknesses is that his damage isn't fast enough.
body:
By that I mean he doesn't have burst.

I'm not saying Vladimir is weak, as I think he is a very strong yet still balanced champion, but what I'm saying is anyone with burst is going to deny this poke and outsustain strategy in an instant by killing you or forcing you to flee.

What I've noticed in most of my games with him is that every single time we get to late game I end up not being able to carry USUALLY because of the enemy team's mid laner, as most of the time they have burst, and will literally delete me regardless of if I pool or not, now maybe this could also have to do with my team because most of the time my team never wants to group, but I've seriously noticed how you can't ever kill someone that can do damage faster than you, considering once you're dead there's no such thing as outsustaining your opponent to where they eventually die.

Just a thought, not that he needs buffs or anything, it's just what I think is one of his weaknesses, now on that note, what are you even supposed to do with Vladimir in late game? I understand in teamfights you usually want to ult to guarantee picking up fleeing enemies but other than that I don't know what to do as I've nailed the laning phase part yet this late game, I need a bit of advice on that.
